column1: Master of Rehabilitation Sciences and Physiotherapy (Leuven)
column3: Faculty of Movement and Rehabilitation Sciences
column5: The Master of Rehabilitation Sciences and Physiotherapy is a highly specialised programme focusing on strong theoretical and scientific insight to provide expert, high-quality care in the field of rehabilitation sciences and physiotherapy. The programme trains graduates to conduct evidence-based practice in physiotherapy and to develop expertise in a specific domain of rehabilitation sciences.All applicants for the Master of Rehabilitation Sciences and Physiotherapy begin by taking theÂ preparatory programme.
